title: Pixilate redesigns
content: Just finished a redesign of [Pixilate](http://web.archive.org/web/20140718112323/http:/www.pixilate.com/) My small foundry with mostly handwritten/handdrawn fonts. It is now mobile and tablet friendly and uses a friendlier system for purchases.
author: spiral

comments.content: Type releases should be posted on the **[Release board](http://web.archive.org/web/20140718112323/http:/typophile.com/forum/7)**.
